name: Space Man (Yusei Umehara)
description:
Created wih the course of Platzi:

Clases del Curso de C# para Videojuegos - Platzi

I know it's has some minor bugs and is repetitive, has no bosses, leaderboard, etc, but it was just for practicing, maybe in the future when i'm more skilfull, i'll improve it or finish it. Until then, i hope you like this mini ver. 

If you like it, comment or screenshot yout highest score.
